name: Del Hill
text: Always a pleasure.  Best tomatoes in the county and nice people

name: Rachel Dawsey
text: Great produce and friendly service!!  A huge range of fruits and vegetables grown on farm.

name: Sandy B
text: Very disappointed with strawberries that I purchased, over half of them were malformed.  They didn't have the sweetness that I expected either.  Will be doing business with Reeves in Hartselle from now on.

name: Garrett Bailey
text: Great people, great service and always a big selection

name: Jamie Tankersley
text: Love getting produce from them! Great people and always friendly

name: Jacky Brown
text: They're great people and I went to school with Marlyn Champion (Holland) at Danville High years ago!

name: James Jones
text: Great family run business! The best strawberries around!

name: Kami Drake
text: Very friendly and accomodating. Fruit is delicious.

name: Franklin Jones
text: Great Strawberries!

name: Reefer Madness Trucking
text: Very friendly receiver, put me on a dock and started unloading as soon as I arrived. Fastest I've ever been unloaded!

name: Adam Mobley
text: They. Lie to there employees work. Them way to long our need two shifts y'all spend to much moneyin over time that makes no sincere Adam Mobley

name: Pepe Lepew
text:
Billy J. Is the BEST. VERY PROFESSIONAL and friendly.  He unload like 20 workers!
The truck entrance is behind the office.
Baggett Rd....

name: Jonathan Golden
text: Was almost ran off the road this morning by one of your employees driving 75 mph on the Circle(50 mph limit),  then they almost rear ended someone while turning on to 231 South, also while they were excessively speeding. White Chevy with mountain dew logo on the side. Tag number started with 5812 I believe, but they were going so fast it was hard to tell. Employees reflect your business.

name: Walter Turner
text: Fast unload

name: Gary Bass
text: Great place to work

name: Candace
text: Great Company

name: Shane Atchison
text: The employees are friendly, far getting a tractor in and out, one of the worst places ive ever been!

name: Speakman28
text: This business is good to the eployees. There isn't a high employee turnover rate, which means the people there like the job.

name: Rita Ward-Maxwell
text: Tour and information by Mo was very helpful and informative!  This was just what we needed to get our business up and running! Looking forward to our long business relationship!

name: Mary Waldman
text: Great facility. I stopped in to pick up dinner from the Transylvanian-Romanian chef and it was delicious. Parking is a little tight but access is easy.

name: Joselyn Sharp
text: If you ever considered opening your own food business, whether it be a food truck, catering company, or restaurant, do yourself a favor and start at Chef's Workshop. Bob and his staff are always available to answer questions, provide guidance, and equip you with the tools you need to make your food dreams come to life!

name: Monae Andrews
text: I love this place it's my home away from home and everyone is so nice to me

name: Takeeka Goshay
text: I have been a customer for a few years now and still love it! I love the versatility they offer for small businesses.

name: Cassie Bolden
text: Chef's Workshop has been a critical component of our successful business. Bob (the owner) is always willing to chat about ways to grow our business and is incredibly helpful. He's simply invaluable. When you sign up for time in the kitchen, you're getting far more than just a sink and stove. You're getting a creative atmosphere that breeds success and encouragement. I don't know where our business would be without time spent at Chef's Workshop. It probably would be non-existent. There's a reason this shared commercial kitchen has been around so long. It was the first in the city, and it's the absolute best! Look no further.

name: Ms Boss Ragland
text: Moe was very nice and helpful

name: Patty Roberson
text: Excellent business, awesome place to run my business Patty Cakes out of.
